title: Morais
body: This family name originates from João de Morais, one of the first settlers of Madeira who lived in Machico, where he had a land grant. His eldest son, Sebastião de Morais, the Elder, justified his nobility in 1508, as stated by the annotator of the 'Saudades.'

Machico: Parish on the island of Madeira

João de Morais: One of the first settlers of Madeira
Sebastião de Morais, the Elder: Eldest son of João de Morais

1508: Justification of the nobility of Sebastião de Morais, the Elder
